data.quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door
data.author: Milton Berle

data.quote: If you can’t make a mistake, you can’t make anything
data.author: Marva Collin

data.quote: It’s not what you do once in a while, it’s what you do day in and day out that makes the difference
data.author: Jenny Craig

data.quote: I always thought it was me against the world and then one day I realized it’s just me against me.
data.author: Kendrick Lamar

data.quote: We realize the importance of our voices only when we are silenced.
data.author: Malala Yousafzai

data.quote: When written in Chinese the word “crisis” is composed of two characters – one represents danger and the other represents opportunity.
data.author: John F Kennedy

data.quote: You never know what you can do until you try.
data.author: William Cobbett
